title: The Week in Oil : Brent Above $70 as U . S .- Iran Tensions Worry Traders
description:
By Giulia Petroni 


  Here's a look at what happened in oil markets in the week of Jan. 26-30 and what the focus will be in the days to come. 


  OVERVIEW: Oil prices are on track for weekly gains...
